verses.verse: And it came to pass after <S%H310><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, when Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> had given rest <S%H5117><s%> unto Israel <S%H3478><s%> from all their enemies <S%H341><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> was old <S%H2204><s%> and well stricken <S%H935><s%> in years <S%H3117><s%>;

that Joshua <S%H3091><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> for all Israel <S%H3478><s%>, for their elders <S%H2205><s%> and for their heads <S%H7218><s%>, and for their judges <S%H8199><s%> and for their officers <S%H7860><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H2204><s%>, I am old and well stricken <S%H935><s%> in years <S%H3117><s%>:

and ye have seen <S%H7200><s%> all that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> hath done <S%H6213><s%> unto all these nations <S%H1471><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of you <S%H3068><s%>; for Jehovah your God <S%H430><s%>, he it is that hath fought for you <S%H3898><s%>.

Behold <S%H7200><s%>, I have allotted <S%H5307><s%> unto you these nations <S%H1471><s%> that remain <S%H7604><s%>, to be an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> for your tribes <S%H7626><s%>, from the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, with all the nations <S%H1471><s%> that I have cut off <S%H3772><s%>, even unto the great <S%H1419><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> toward the going down of the sun <S%H3996><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, he will thrust <S%H1920><s%> them out from before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H3423><s%>, and drive them from out of your sight <S%H6440><s%>; and ye shall possess <S%H3423><s%> their land <S%H776><s%>, as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> spake unto you <S%H1696><s%>.

Therefore be ye very <S%H3966><s%> courageous <S%H2388><s%> to keep <S%H8104><s%> and to do <S%H6213><s%> all that is written <S%H3789><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the law <S%H8451><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>, that ye turn <S%H5493><s%> not aside therefrom to the right hand <S%H3225><s%> or to the left <S%H8040><s%>;

that ye come <S%H935><s%> not among these nations <S%H1471><s%>, these that remain <S%H7604><s%> among you <S%H2142><s%>; neither make mention of the name <S%H8034><s%> of their gods <S%H430><s%>, nor cause to swear <S%H7650><s%> by them <S%H5647><s%>, neither serve them <S%H7812><s%>, nor bow down yourselves unto them;
but cleave <S%H1692><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, as ye have done <S%H6213><s%> unto this day <S%H3117><s%>.

For Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath driven out <S%H3423><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you great <S%H1419><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> and strong <S%H6099><s%>; but as for you <S%H376><s%>, no man hath stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you unto this day <S%H3117><s%>.

One <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> of you shall chase <S%H7291><s%> a thousand <S%H505><s%>; for Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, he it is that fighteth <S%H3898><s%> for you <S%H1696><s%>, as he spake unto you.
Take good <S%H3966><s%> heed <S%H8104><s%> therefore unto yourselves <S%H5315><s%>, that ye love <S%H157><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.

Else if ye do at all <S%H7725><s%> go back <S%H7725><s%>, and cleave <S%H1692><s%> unto the remnant <S%H3499><s%> of these nations <S%H1471><s%>, even these that remain <S%H7604><s%> among you <S%H2859><s%>, and make marriages with them <S%H935><s%>, and go in unto them, and they to you;

know <S%H3045><s%> for a certainty <S%H3045><s%> that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will no more <S%H3254><s%> drive these nations <S%H1471><s%> from out <S%H3423><s%> of your sight <S%H6440><s%>; but they shall be a snare <S%H6341><s%> and a trap <S%H4170><s%> unto you <S%H7850><s%>, and a scourge in your sides <S%H6654><s%>, and thorns <S%H6796><s%> in your eyes <S%H5869><s%>, until ye perish <S%H6><s%> from off this good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H127><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> hath given you <S%H5414><s%>.

And <S%H3117><s%>, behold, this day I am going <S%H1980><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of all the earth <S%H776><s%>: and ye know <S%H3045><s%> in all your hearts <S%H3824><s%> and in all your souls <S%H5315><s%>, that not one <S%H259><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> hath failed <S%H5307><s%> of all the good <S%H2896><s%> things <S%H1697><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> concerning you <S%H935><s%>; all are come to pass unto you <S%H259><s%>, not one thing <S%H1697><s%> hath failed thereof <S%H5307><s%>.

And it shall come to pass <S%H2896><s%>, that as all the good things <S%H1697><s%> are come <S%H935><s%> upon you of which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto you <S%H3068><s%>, so will Jehovah bring <S%H935><s%> upon you all the evil <S%H7451><s%> things <S%H1697><s%>, until he have destroyed <S%H8045><s%> you from off this good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H127><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> hath given you <S%H5414><s%>.

When ye transgress <S%H5674><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, which he commanded <S%H6680><s%> you <S%H1980><s%>, and go and serve <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>, and bow <S%H7812><s%> down yourselves to them <S%H639><s%>; then will the anger of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> be kindled <S%H2734><s%> against you <S%H6><s%>, and ye shall perish quickly <S%H4120><s%> from off the good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> which he hath given unto you <S%H5414><s%>.
